mapper.select: SELECT MF.FEED_NUM, MF.STAR, MFP.ATT_FILE, MS.STORE_NAME FROM MJA_FEED MF INNER JOIN MJA_FEED_PHOTO MFP ON MF.FEED_NUM = MFP.FEED_NUM INNER JOIN MJA_STORE MS ON MF.STORE_NUM = MS.STORE_NUM WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dbsewoomch.MJA_USER_INFO(EMAIL, ID, NICK_NAME, PASSWORD, NAVER, KAKAOTALK, PROFILE_PHOTO) VALUES(#{EMAIL}, #{ID}, #{NICK_NAME}, #{PASSWORD}, #{NAVER}, #{KAKAOTALK}, #{PROFILE_PHOTO});
